Author: ronyi#5719
Content: Just theory: We say PIRATE is secure, but every mining page  (except: https://piratechain.org) use stratum+tcp, every data send "plain text" between  miners and mining pools. If miners not use TOR or  VPN or... government can assign a Z address to the IP address clearly(users to Z).  The node is a little bit different in my opinion. I just thinking simple privacy. I do not intend to harm the pool operators or violate it. think about it together. thanks in advance for the constructive comments.
